name: Kuu Mach Alpine Speedwax 500g
description: Three flavours of general-purpose alpine glidewax. Though it may seem counter-intuitive, the alpine glidewaxes are a little softer than and less persistent than the nordic versions.500g packages, each sold separately.Yellow -5°C and above (moist snow), Red -5°C to -9°C (universal), Green -9°C and below (cold).
